data.actual_result: The channel name gets truncated a few characters after than what it used to do initially. When you long press on the channel name, the last character moves out the highlight.
data.expected_result: The channel name gets truncated a few characters before like it used to do before.
data.short_description: Channel with long names get truncated after a few more characters than before that causes the channel name to cross the highlight around the channel name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a channel with a fairly long name to show it to the end of the channel drawer without getting truncated. - Long press on the channel name for the highlight to appear around it.
